test_scenarios.name: Account Creation & Login
steps: Enter valid email, phone number, and password to create an account.
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the QuickBooks dashboard.

test_scenarios.name: Dashboard Navigation
steps: Verify the dashboard elements load correctly
Click on 'Invoicing' in the left navigation menu.
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is redirected to the Invoicing page.

test_scenarios.name: Invoice Creation
steps: Select an existing customer or create a new one.
Add at least one product or service with a quantity and rate.
test_scenarios.expected_result: Invoice is created successfully and displayed in the invoice list.

test_scenarios.name: Expense Tracking
steps: Enter the expense details (payee, category, amount, date).
test_scenarios.expected_result: Expense is created successfully and displayed in the expense list.

test_scenarios.name: Bank Account Connection
steps: Search for a bank (e.g., 'Bank of America').
Select the bank and enter valid login credentials (using test or mock data where possible; real credentials are NOT recommended).
Select a bank account to connect to QuickBooks.
test_scenarios.expected_result: Bank account is successfully connected and transactions start importing (Note: Actual transaction import will depend on the test environment setup).

test_scenarios.name: Reporting (Basic Profit & Loss)
steps: Search for and select 'Profit and Loss' report.
Run the report for the current month.
test_scenarios.expected_result: Profit and Loss report is generated and displayed with default settings.
